channel.title: Applications on Text Mining for Information Professionals
channel.description: Recent content in Applications on Text Mining for Information Professionals

item.title: Applications
item.description: Coconut Library Tools Coconut Library Tool app was developed by two librarians in order to help librarians or anyone who needs cool features but is hindered by programming languages. Using this app librarians can perform (i) keyword stem, (ii) topic modeling, (iii) bidirected network, and (iv) sunburst. This app works on Scopus’s CSV file, Web of Science’s Tab delimited file, and custom CSV file.
